```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

originalData <- read_csv(here('Data//final 1312.csv'))

colnames(originalData)
```

# Removing extra columns and initial deficit rows

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

Data_1 <- originalData %>% 
  select (-c(StartDate, EndDate, Status, IPAddress, Progress, Finished,
             RecipientLastName, RecipientFirstName, RecipientEmail, ExternalReference,
             LocationLatitude, LocationLongitude, DistributionChannel, UserLanguage, drivingLicense, Q73,
             everParticipated_2_TEXT, Disturbances_2_TEXT))

Data_2 <- Data_1 %>% 
  filter(!Remove %in% c('Remove', 'Double'))
```
